page.title: 09Golspie-Travel Survey.
page.content: We did a survey of how some of our school pupils travelled about. We asked the following questions:_ { {1.How do you usually come to school? ANSWER:walking_18,cycling_11,car_6, bus_1.(36 pupils) { {2.If you went to Inverness how would {you travel?(Inverness is our main town {60 miles away.)} ANSWER:car_26,bus_2,train_3.(31pupils) { {3.How often do you travel to {Inverness.When did you last go to {Inverness? } ANSWER:a.In the last 2 weeks._13. b.In the last 2 months._10. c.In the last 6 months._8.
